entry.title: Binance‚Äôs Market Share Drops amid Regulatory Pressure
entry.summary: The market share of the top cryptocurrency exchange Binance and its US affiliate, Binance.US, has declined, the latest market data shows. The decline is anticipated to be due to the recent lawsuit filed against the exchange by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The market share of Binance.US had dropped the most. According to the cryptocurrency data provider, Kaiko, as quoted by Reuters, the market share of the purportedly independent exchange dropped from 22% to 0.9% between April and June. Regulatory Troubles Binance.US was dealt a blow when the SEC sought court orders to freeze the assets of the exchange. entry.title: IMF Identifies Crypto As An ‚ÄòObstacle‚Äô To Tax Collection Systems ‚Äì Here‚Äôs Why
entry.summary:
The IMF, or International Monetary Fund, renowned for its extensive research and analysis in the realm of global finance, has recently released a working paper that sheds light on the intricate challenges associated with tax collection in the realm of cryptocurrencies.¬†
This report brings into focus the increasingly complex nature of tax treatment in relation to these digital assets, as cryptocurrencies straddle the dual roles of investments and currencies.¬†
Furthermore, the paper underscores the formidable obstacles posed by the pseudonymous nature of cryptocurrency systems, which in turn hinder the collection and enforcement of tax codes.
IMF Working Paper Explores Complexities Of Taxing Cryptocurrencies

Report: South Africa Regulator Says Unlicensed Crypto Exchanges in 2024 May Be Closed Down
entry.summary:
According to the regulator of the South African financial services industry, cryptocurrency exchanges based in the country must secure operating licenses before the year ends. Crypto exchanges that fail to abide by the requirement will either be fined or closed down, Unathi Kamlana, the Financial Sector Conduct Authority commissioner, said.
The Importance of Regulation
The South African financial services regulator, Financial Sector Conduct Authority (FSCA), has said cryptocurrency exchanges operating in the country must secure operating licenses before the end of the year. According to Unathi Kamlana, the FSCA commissioner, entities that fail to abide by this requirement will either be fined or closed down.

entry.title: Binance Terminates Support For 8 Multi-Chain Bridged Tokens
entry.summary:
World‚Äôs biggest cryptocurrency exchange, Binance, has announced it is ceasing support of deposits and withdrawals for an array of Multichain-bridged tokens starting from July 7, 2023.¬†
On May 25, Binance initially suspended the deposit of 10 Multichain-bridged tokens due to days-long delays in transaction time on the Multichain protocol.
A few days later, the debacle worsened when Multichain announced it could not¬†contact its CEO Zhaojun.
As a result of its CEO being inaccessible, the team behind Multichain stated they couldn‚Äôt obtain the necessary server keys for the maintenance of some nodes, which affected the cross-chain operations of various networks, including ONUS, Omax, Findora, etc.¬†
Binance Halts Support For Multichain-Bridged Tokens On Certain Chains

entry.title: Binance Market Share Declines Amid Regulatory Challenges, US Affiliate Also Impacted
entry.summary:
The year has been challenging for Binance, the world‚Äôs leading cryptocurrency exchange, and its U.S. counterpart, Binance.US. Both have considerably reduced their market shares due to increased regulatory scrutiny across various global jurisdictions.
A notable setback came from a lawsuit the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) filed against the company alleging regulatory violations. Data from analytics firm Kaiko indicates this lawsuit contributed to Binance‚Äôs global market share dipping from 60% at the beginning of the year to 52% as of last month.
Binance‚Äôs Strategy Adjustment And Its Market Impact

entry.title: Iran‚Äôs President Says De-Dollarization Key to a Fair International System
entry.summary:
Iran‚Äôs President Ebrahim Raisi has pushed for de-dollarization, stating that any attempt to ‚Äúshape a fair international system‚Äù requires the removal of the U.S. dollar. ‚ÄúWhat forms the basis of the Western domination system has been the dominance of the dollar,‚Äù the Iranian leader stressed.
Iranian President Calls for De-Dollarization at SCO Summit
Iran‚Äôs President Ebrahim Raisi emphasized the need to de-dollarize in his remarks at the 23rd virtual summit of the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) Council of Heads of State on Tuesday. Iran became a new permanent member of the SCO at the summit, which was hosted by India and chaired by Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi.
The summit was also attended by China‚Äôs President Xi Jinping, Russia‚Äôs President Vladimir Putin, Kazakhstan‚Äôs ‚Ä¶

entry.title: XRP‚Äôs Total Supply Plummets Over The Past 30 Days, Lead Ripple Dev Explains Why
entry.summary:
XRP, the native token of the XRPL protocol, has decreased its total supply. Over the past 30 days, roughly 247,016 XRP tokens have been permanently burned, reducing the total circulating supply.
This trend was first highlighted by an anonymous Twitter account, sparking a wave of speculation within the XRP community.
Neil Hartner, a senior staff software engineer at Ripple, was prompted to address the ongoing conjectures about this token burn. Hartner‚Äôs clarifications have provided the crypto community with insights into the internal workings of the XRP Ledger and the potential implications for its native token.
XRP Ledger Account Deletions ‚Äì The Catalyst
Hartner revealed that this unexpected XRP burn was due to a series of accounts being removed from the XRP Ledger. Each deletio‚Ä¶

entry.title: Crypto Exchanges Spot Trading Volume Witness First Increase In Three Months
entry.summary:
In June, spot trading volume on centralized crypto exchanges rose by over 16% to $575 billion. This increase represents its first increase in three months, according to a CCData review.
This surge in trading activity across spot markets has been linked to the increased activity of institutions and regulatory bodies. The report said:¬†
The increase in volatility following the SEC‚Äôs lawsuit against Binance.US and Coinbase, and the positive outlook in the market following the filing of spot Bitcoin ETFs by the likes of BlackRock and Fidelity, contributed to an increase in trading activity last month.¬†
However, this recent increase had a minimal effect on the overall spot trading volumes, which remain at historically low levels. According to CCData, the spot trading volumes on centralize‚Ä¶

entry.title: Bitcoin ETFs Resubmitted: Slam Dunk With The SEC Or Rejected Again?
entry.summary:
Following the SEC stating that recent filings were inadequate, all spot Bitcoin ETF proposals have been submitted.
With the ball back in the SEC‚Äôs court, will the latest updates to lead to a slam dunk approval with the chief US regulator, or another ruthless rejection?
BlackRock Spot Bitcoin ETF Resubmitted Along With Others
Weeks ago, $10+ trillion AUM investment giant BlackRock revealed it had filed with the SEC for approval on a spot Bitcoin ETF. Despite BlackRock being approved for 575 ETFs to one denial, the SEC claimed the filing, along with others, weren‚Äôt adequate.
However, a new chart shows that the BlackRock iShares Bitcoin Trust has been resubmitted, along with all other spot BTC ETFs. Other filings include firms such as Cathie Wood‚Äôs ARK Invest, Bitwise, VanEck, Fidel‚Ä¶

entry.title: Valkyrie Refiles Spot Bitcoin ETF, Taps Coinbase As SSA Counterpart
entry.summary:
According to a recent Bloomberg report, Valkyrie has refiled an application for a Bitcoin (BTC) Spot exchange-traded fund (ETF) that would invest directly in Bitcoin. The firm has named Coinbase as the market surveillance provider for the ETF.¬†
The US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) had previously pushed back against Valkyrie‚Äôs application due to a lack of clarity.¬†
Bitcoin ETF Competition Intensifies
The new documents filed on Wednesday state that Nasdaq, which Valkyrie would list if approved, had executed a term sheet with Coinbase to enter into a surveillance-sharing agreement.¬†
Crypto market surveillance is crucial to gaining SEC approval for a spot Bitcoin ETF. The SEC has rejected around 30 spot Bitcoin ETF applications due to fraud and market manipulation concerns‚Ä¶

entry.summary:
The United States arm of the crypto exchange Binance has been targeted by regulators over the last month. As a result, the Binance.US exchange has been seeing its market share declining rapidly, and now, the crypto exchange‚Äôs market share in the country has fallen to an all-time low.
Binance.US Market Share Falls Below 1%
Since the start of the year 2023, the market share of Binance.US had been on a steady rise as the exchange gained ground in the country. By April 2023, its market share grew rapidly and reached a peak of 27%, around which it trended as the crypto market struggled to fight off the bears. However, this was only short-lived as the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) came after the exchange.

entry.title: Saxo Bank Ordered to Liquidate Its Portfolio of Crypto Assets by Danish Financial Regulator
entry.summary:
According to a July 4, 2023 press release from the Danish Financial Supervisory Authority, Denmark‚Äôs Saxo Bank has been instructed to liquidate its holdings of cryptocurrency assets. The financial regulator maintains that Saxo Bank‚Äôs portfolio of crypto assets falls ‚Äúoutside the legal business area of ‚Äã‚Äãfinancial institutions‚Äù and is in violation of the country‚Äôs Financial Business Act.
Danish Financial Regulator Insists ‚ÄòUnregulated Trading in Crypto-Assets Can Create Distrust in the Financial System‚Äô

entry.summary: Daniel Paez, Executive Producer on Immutable X-based card-battler Gods Unchained, discusses the long-running NFT game's launch on the Epic Games Store and the opportunity it provides.

entry.title: 'Play-to-Earn Is Not Dead. It Will Never Die' Says Words with Friends Creator Paul Bettner
entry.summary: Words With Friends and Wildcard Creator Paul Bettner tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his perspective on Axie Infinity and Web3 games.

entry.title: Cross the Ages Game Review: A Tough But Rewarding Card Battler
entry.summary: Cross the Ages is a digital collectible card game that challenges players to duel online opponents‚Äîand you can even mint your cards as tradable NFTs. It's complex and difficult to grasp at first, but this mobile-first game has some serious strategic upside. GG contributor Ryan Gladwin puts Cross the Ages through its paces.

entry.title: "AI Is Game-Changing But Needs Fact-Checking": AlchemyAI Project Lead
entry.summary: In this interview, Decrypt's Jason Nelson chats with Alchemy product manager and AlchemyAI project lead Elan Halpern on blockchain analysis using ChatGPT, what AI means for better user experience, and the need to fact-check AI. Halpern also gives a demo of the new AlchemyAI ChatGPT plugin.

entry.title: Fractal Is Like an Arcade, Says Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan
entry.summary: Justin Kan was a co-founder of Twitch and now works on Fractal, a Web3 gaming startup. Kan tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his new company and what he's up to.

entry.title: Are NFTs the Next SEC Target?
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin discusses the current regulatory climate in the U.S. with Gala Games' President of Blockchain Jason Brink.

entry.title: Collab.Land Co-Founder Said There Was No ‚ÄòAha Moment‚Äô When Launching DAO Toolkit
entry.summary: CCO and co-founder of Collab.Land Anjali Young explained at this year‚Äôs NFC Lisbon the origins of the crypto community tool kit, which industry niches are turning to its suite of products, and what‚Äôs next for the project since its token distribution event last February.

entry.title: Buying a Slice of H.R. Giger's 'Alien' Is Fine Art, Not Memorabilia: Particle CEO
entry.summary: With H.R. Giger's original "Alien" statue on full display at this year's NFC Lisbon, Particle CEO Harold Eytan told Decrypt that owning an NFT-ified slice of the piece isn't just for fans of the iconic creature and movie series but also for fine art collectors. Interested in owning a piece? Be prepared to cough up half an ETH for one of the 500 tranches of the digitized sculpture.

entry.title: Community Co-Creation 'Is a Big Step for Fashion Brands' Entering the Metaverse: BNV Founder and CEO
entry.summary: The founder and CEO of metaverse fashion platform BNV Richard Hobbs said big brands are still nervous to let fans and community members customize their favorite garments. Still, he believes that as long as you can meet a firm's commercial bottom lines while stirring engagement, there's nothing to lose.
